achievement_load_progress: This function will send a request to the server for information on all available achievements. It will trigger a callback Social Asynchronous Event which contains the async_load map populated with the relevant key/value pairs. The id key of this DS Map is used to identify the correct callback (there can be more than one trigger function for any given asynchronous event), and will be paired with the constant achievement_achievement_info as well as a number of other key/value pairs for each player. The exact contents of the map are shown below:
"id" - For this function it should be achievement_achievement_info.
"numentries" - The number of achievements in the list.
"AchN" - The name of the achievement, where "N" is an integer value corresponding to its place in the entries list.
"AchCompN" - How complete the achievement "N" is as a percentage value from 0 to 100 (a string).
